property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Name a card. Your opponent destroys the top card of his Life Deck. If the card you named was destroyed, use a critical damage effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may not search for Android 18's Toss with this card's effect.) Energy attack costing 2 stages. You may search your Life Deck for a card with Android in the title and place it into your hand. If that card was a Setup, Drill, or Ally, you may place it into play. Damage 4 life cards. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Stops an energy attack. Gain 4 stages. Search your discard pile for a card with Android in the title and place it into your hand. Attach to your MP. While attached, you may banish this card to cancel the immediate effects of an energy attack.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: (Only one copy of Android 19's Choke can be attached in play.) Physical attack. Raise your anger 2 levels. Attach to your opponent's MP. While attached, gain 1 stage whenever your opponent gains stages. Destroy this card when your MP's power level is 0. Damage 5 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may use this Drill more than once per turn, but only once per attack.) POWER: Destroy the top 2 cards of your Life Deck to prevent all damage from an energy attack.

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 2. Physical Attack. Your opponent's personalities lose 1 stage. Name a card. Search your opponent's Life Deck for a copy of that card and banish it. At the end of combat, you may choose a non-Event card from your discard pile and place it on top of your Life Deck. (Banish after Use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy attack costing 3 stages. This attack can only be stopped by Energy Combat cards. Damage 5 life cards. HIT: If your MP is a Hero, gain 2 stages and Rejuvenate 2. If your MP is a Villain, banish the top 5 cards of your opponent's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Instant] POWER: Use when entering combat. Cards that stop attacks lose all immediate effects this combat. Choose 2 Styled attacks from your discard pile and shuffle them into your Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: (You may only have one copy of Android Attack Drill in play.) [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage. Attacks performed by personalities with Android in the title deal +1 life card damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Allies, Drills, and Setups cannot enter play during combat this turn. If you played Moment of Peace this turn draw a card. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (You cannot win by MPPV if you use this card). POWER: Banish 4 cards with Android in the title from your discard pile to raise your anger 6 levels.

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: ENDURANCE 1. Energy attack. Players can only gain anger from the effects of Physical Combat or Energy Combat cards this turn. Damage 3 life cards. HIT: Shuffle this card into your Life Deck after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Limit 2 per deck.) POWER: Stops a physical or energy attack. If that attack was a Named card, it deals no damage and is banished after use. Banish the top card of your Life Deck. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Energy Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Energy combat costing 2 stages. Damage 6 life cards. HIT: capture a Dragon Ball. If you captured a Namek Dragon Ball, destroy the top 3 cards of your opponent;s Life Deck. If you captured an Earth Dragon Ball, draw a card. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Physical Combat

property.name: Text
property.value: Physical attack. Damage from this attack cannot be prevented. This attack cannot be stopped and its damage is banished if your opponent controls a total of 7 or more of the following card types, personalities, Drills, Setups, and Dragon Balls. Damage 5 life cards (Banish after Use.)

property.name: Text
property.value: (When this card is discarded or destroyed from your Life Deck, banish an Ally.) POWER: Banish an Ally. Lower your opponent's anger 2 levels. Shuffle into your Life Deck after use.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Search your Banished Zone for a Named card and place it on top of your Life Deck. Search your Life Deck for a Named attack card and place it into your hand. Your opponent may discard a card from his hand to search his Life Deck for a Named attack card and place it into his hand. (Banish after use.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: (When this Drill enters play, set all personalities to 5 stages above 0) [Constant]: Personalities cannot be more than 5 stages above 0. Whenever an Ally's power level is 0, it is banished.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Energy attack. You may search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. That Ally can make actions regardless of your MP's power stage this combat. Damage 6 life cards. HIT: If your next attack this combat is performed by an Ally, it cannot be stopped.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Ultra Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: The first Styled physical attack you perform each combat cannot be stopped. The first Styled energy attack you perform each combat gains “HIT: Search your discard pile for a physical attack card and place it into your hand.”

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. If this attack is stopped, your opponent skips his next action this combat. Damage AT +1 stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Use only if you have not performed an attack from your hand this combat.) POWER: Physical attack. Damage 8 stages

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Place a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your Life Deck to choose an attack card from your discard pile and place it into your hand. Your opponent skips his next action this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +5 stages of damage

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: you need 1 less anger to advance a personality level (to a minimum of 4). Your Styled attacks gain - HIT: You may raise your anger 1 level. POWER: Discard a Styled card with Endurance from your hand to perform a non-Styled physical attack dealing 1+X stages of damage. X = the amount of Endurance on the discarded card.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. You may return an Ally you control to its owner's hand. Damage 2 life cards. Hit: At the end of combat, you may search your Life Deck for an Ally and place it on top of your Life Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +2 life cards of damage. [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Choose an Ally in play. Players cannot use effects that would cause that Ally to leave play this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Energy attack. You may search your Life Deck or discard pile for an Ally and play it. That Ally can make actions regardless of your MP's power stage this combat. Damage 6 life cards. HIT: If your next attack this combat is performed by an Ally, it cannot be stopped.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Search your Life Deck, discard pile, or Banished Zone for an Ally and place it into play at its highest power stage. Choose one of your Allies in play. For the remainder of combat , that Ally may make actions regardless of your MP's power stage and attacks performed by that Ally deal +4 life cards of damage

property.name: Text
property.value: (At the start of your opponent's first turn, search your Life Deck for an Ally and place it into play at 3 power stages above 0.) [CONSTANT]: While you control 1 Ally, it cannot be discarded by critical damage effects. [INSTANT] POWER: Use at the end of combat. Choose an Ally in your Banished Zone and Rejuvenate it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever you gain stages from a card effect, raise your anger 1 level. Whenever you Rejuvenate during combat, raise your anger 1 level.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. At the end of combat, you may search your Life Deck for a Styled card and place it on the top or bottom of your Life Deck. Damage AT +4 stages.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical Attack. Damage 7 stages. Hit: You may return a Dragon Ball you control to its owner's hand. If you do, capture a Dragon Ball.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your opponent cannot use the immediate effects of Dragon Balls. Your Styled cards with Endurance have their Endurance increased by X. X = the number of Dragon Balls your control. POWER: Search a Banished Zone for a Dragon Ball that isn't already in play and play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: [INSTANT] POWER: Use at the end of the turn. Reveal the bottom card of your Life Deck. If that card is Styled or a Dragon Ball, you may place it into your hand. If you do, place a card from your hand on the top of bottom of your Life Deck. POWER Raise your anger 2 levels. You may discard a Dragon Ball or Styled card from your hand to shuffle your Life Deck and draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: The first time each combat one of your card effects requires you to discard 1 cards from your hand, you may reveal that card instead. INSTANT POWER Use when you perform a Styled attack. You may choose for that attack to deal its life card damage as stages of damage instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Whenever your perform a Styled attack you may choose for that attack to deal its life card damage as stages of damage instead. POWER Physical attack Damage 4 life cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time each combat a card effect requires you to discard 1 card from your hand, you may reveal that card instead. Whenever you perform a Styled attack, you may choose for that attack to deal its life card damage as stages of damage instead or vice versa.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: The first Styled physical attack you perform each combat cannot be stopped. The first Styled energy attack you perform each combat gains - HIT: Search your discard pile for a physical attack card and place it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your attacks deal +1 stage of damage. After your MP advances a level, search your discard pile for a Drill and Rejuvenate it. [INSTANT] POWER: Use after performing a successful Styled attack. That attack gains “Hit: If you control 2 or less Drills, search your Life Deck for a Styled '[CONSTANT]:' Drill and place it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. You may search your Life Deck or discard pile for Android 17's Van and place it into play. Damage AT +1 stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Physical attack. You may destroy an opponent's Ally. Damage AT + 3 stages. Hit: Search your discard pile or Banished Zone for Android 17's Van and place it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: POWER: Energy attack. Allies cannot have damage redirected to them this combat. If Android 17's Van is in play, damage from this attack cannot be prevented. Damage 6 life cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: Your physical attacks deal +X stages of damage and can only be stopped by Physical Combat cards. X= the number of Allies in your opponent's Banished Zone. [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. You may search your Banished Zone for Android 17's Van and place it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: [INSTANT] POWER: Use when entering combat. Banish the top card of your discard pile. If you banished a Styled card, your Styled physical attacks this combat deal +2 stages of damage and gain - HIT Lower your opponent's anger 1 level. POWER: Reveal a Styled card from your hand and place it at the bottom of your Life Deck. If you do and the top card of your discard pile is an attack card, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: While your MP's power level is over 20,000 your opponent's first physical attack each combat cannot have its damage modified. POWER: Energy attack. Damage 0 life cards. HIT Place your hand on the bottom of your Life Deck to draw the same number of cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: [CONSTANT]: While your MP's power level is over 50,000 your opponent's physical attacks cannot have their damage modified. Your attacks deal +1 life card of damage.
